metadata.title: Twitter now lets you enable 2FA without asking for your phone number
metadata.description: Twitter has changed its security settings to let you use two-factor authentication (2FA) without having to give the service your phone number. Instead, you should probable use an authentication app, since they‚Äôre more secure.

sections: Twitter seems to be going through some rapid product evolution right now. Here's a quick compliation of what you need to know.
November: Getting topical, hidden and safer
January: no edits but better replies
